stories.text:
Pretty much the title.

I genuinely enjoyed listening to Craig discuss with different YC founders about the ups and downs of starting up, pivoting etc. As someone who doesn't enjoy long videos, the YC podcast was a godsend, well integrated with my daily commute and routine. I genuienly miss it and would love if it was brought back, or at least an update as to why it was discontinued.

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask YC: What happened to the YC podcast?

stories.text:
These past 3 days i created a simple webapp that displays for you the NFTs of a given wallet i need your feedback on this also if you have some features or ideas that can be added to it i'll be happy to discuss those ideas thank you

https://sonftyz.com
